Obtener departamentos de Colombia

Código: R/utils.R
obtener_dptos.Rd

Función que obtiene los departamentos de Colombia

Uso

obtener_dptos()

Valor

Un `data.frame` con los departamentos de Colombia

Ejemplos

obtener_dptos()
#>  [1] "Amazonas"                                                
#>  [2] "Antioquia"                                               
#>  [3] "Arauca"                                                  
#>  [4] "Archipielago de San Andres, Providencia y Santa Catalina"
#>  [5] "Catalina"                                                
#>  [6] "Atlantico"                                               
#>  [7] "Bogota D.C."                                             
#>  [8] "Bolivar"                                                 
#>  [9] "Boyaca"                                                  
#> [10] "Caldas"                                                  
#> [11] "Caqueta"                                                 
#> [12] "Casanare"                                                
#> [13] "Cauca"                                                   
#> [14] "Cesar"                                                   
#> [15] "Choco"                                                   
#> [16] "Cordoba"                                                 
#> [17] "Cundinamarca"                                            
#> [18] "Guainia"                                                 
#> [19] "Guaviare"                                                
#> [20] "Huila"                                                   
#> [21] "La Guajira"                                              
#> [22] "Magdalena"                                               
#> [23] "Meta"                                                    
#> [24] "Nariño"                                                  
#> [25] "Norte de Santander"                                      
#> [26] "Putumayo"                                                
#> [27] "Quindio"                                                 
#> [28] "Risaralda"                                               
#> [29] "Santander"                                               
#> [30] "Sucre"                                                   
#> [31] "Tolima"                                                  
#> [32] "Valle del Cauca"                                         
#> [33] "Vaupes"                                                  
#> [34] "Vichada"
